usage_rules.headings: Use 'Source Serif 4' for all H1-H3. Font weights: Light (300) or Semibold (600). Tight tracking (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use 'Inter' for all body text. High legibility. Relaxed line-height (1.6).

buttons.primary: rounded-none px-8 py-3 bg-black text-white font-medium hover:translate-y-[-2px] transition-transform
buttons.secondary: rounded-none px-8 py-3 border border-zinc-200 hover:border-black transition-colors

inputs.style: rounded-none border-x-0 border-t-0 border-b border-zinc-300 bg-transparent px-0 focus:border-black focus:ring-0 transition-colors placeholder:text-zinc-400

cards.style: rounded-none border border-zinc-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow bg-white

visual_enhancers.lines: 1px solid dividers, often spanning full width
visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimal. shadow-sm or none. Rely on borders and spacing.

instructions_to_main_agent: STRICTLY enforce the 'Source Serif 4' for headings and 'Inter' for body rule.
Use 'rounded-none' or very small 'rounded-sm' (2px) for all components to maintain the Swiss/Brutalist aesthetic.
Avoid gradients. Use solid black, white, and grays.
Use generous padding. Don't crowd elements.
For the Dashboard, use a high-density grid but keep it clean with white backgrounds and subtle borders.
Implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle that inverts the scheme to Black background / White text.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy shadows.
